annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (11) To avoid disrupting the clearance of goods carried in travellers' personal baggage, it is appropriate, except where certain material indications suggest commercial traffic is involved, to exclude from the scope of this Regulation goods that may be counterfeit, pirated or infringe certain intellectual property rights when imported from third countries within the limits of the duty-free allowance accorded by Community rules.
annotations.translation: (11) 为避免影响旅客个人行李中携带物品的通关，除非有某些重要迹象表明涉及商业运输，否则应将在共同体规定的免税限额内从第三国进口的可能是假冒、盗版或侵犯某些知识产权的物品排除在本条例的适用范围之外。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (12) In the interests of this Regulation's effectiveness, it is important to ensure the uniform application of the common rules it lays down and to reinforce mutual assistance between the Member States and between the Member States and the Commission, in particular by recourse to Council Regulation (EC) No 515/97 of 13 March 1997 on mutual assistance between the administrative authorities of the Member States and cooperation between the latter and the Commission to ensure the correct application of the law on customs and agricultural matters (¹).
annotations.translation: (12) 为了本条例的有效性，重要的是确保本条例制定的共同规则的统一适用，并加强成员国之间以及成员国与委员会之间的互助，特别是通过理事会 (EC) 1997 年 3 月 13 日第 515/97 号条例，该条例涉及成员国行政机构之间的相互协助以及后者与委员会之间的合作，以确保海关和农业事务法律的正确适用 (¹)。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (13) In the light of the experience gained in the implementation of this Regulation, inter alia, consideration should be given to the possibility of increasing the number of intellectual property rights covered.
annotations.translation: (13) 根据执行本条例的经验，除其他外，应考虑增加所涵盖的知识产权数量的可能性。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (14) The measures necessary for the implementation of this Regulation should be adopted in accordance with Council Decision 1999/468/EC of 28 June 1999 laying down the procedures for the exercise of implementing powers conferred on the Commission (²).
annotations.translation: (14) 应根据理事会 1999 年 6 月 28 日第 1999/468/EC 号决定通过实施本条例所需的措施，该决定规定了行使赋予委员会的执行权力的程序 (²)。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (15) Regulation (EC) No 3295/94 should be repealed,

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS REGULATION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下条例：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: SUBJECT MATTER AND SCOPE
annotations.translation: 主题和范围

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: CHAPTER I
annotations.translation: 第一章

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. This Regulation sets out the conditions for action by the customs authorities when goods are suspected of infringing an intellectual property right in the following situations:
annotations.translation: 1. 本条例规定了海关当局在下列情况下对涉嫌侵犯知识产权的货物采取行动的条件：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) when they are entered for release for free circulation, export or re-export in accordance with Article 61 of Council Regulation (EC) No 2913/92 of 12 October 1992 establishing the Community Customs Code (³);
annotations.translation: (a) 根据 1992 年 10 月 12 日制定《共同体海关法典》(³) 的理事会 (EC) 第 2913/92 号条例第 61 条为自由流通、出口或再出口而进入时；

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (¹) OJ L 82, 22.3.1997, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 807/2003 (OJ L 122, 16.5.2003, p. 36).
annotations.translation: (¹) OJ L 82，1997 年 3 月 22 日， 第 1 页。经 (EC) 第 807/2003 号条例 （OJ L 122，2003 年 5 月16 日，第 36 页）最后修正的条例。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (³) OJ L 302, 19.10.1992, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 2700/2000, of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L 311, 12.12.2000, p. 17).
annotations.translation: (³) OJ L 302，1992 年 10 月 19 日，第 1 页。欧洲议会和理事会 (EC) 第 2700/2000 号条例最后修正的条例（OJ L 311，2000 年 12 月 12 日，第 17 页）。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) when they are found during checks on goods entering or leaving the Community customs territory in accordance with Articles 37 and 183 of Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92, placed under a suspensive procedure within the meaning of Article 84(1)(a) of that Regulation, in the process of being re-exported subject to notification under Article 182(2) of that Regulation or placed in a free zone or free warehouse within the meaning of Article 166 of that Regulation.
annotations.translation: (b) 根据 (EEC) 第 2913/92 号条例第 37 条和第 183 条对进出欧共体关境的货物进行检查时发现的、根据该条例第 84(1)(a) 条的规定按暂扣程序放置的、根据该条例第 182(2) 条的规定在发出通知后正在重新出口的、或根据该条例第 166 条的规定放置在免税区或免税仓库中的。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. This Regulation also fixes the measures to be taken by the competent authorities when the goods referred to in paragraph 1 are found to infringe intellectual property rights.
annotations.translation: 2. 本条例还规定了主管机构在发现第 1 段所述货物侵犯知识产权时应采取的措施。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. For the purposes of this Regulation, 'goods infringing an intellectual property right' means:
annotations.translation: 1. 在本条例中，“侵犯知识产权的货物”是指：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) 'counterfeit goods', namely:
annotations.translation: (a) “假冒商品”，即：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) goods, including packaging, bearing without authorisation a trademark identical to the trademark validly registered in respect of the same type of goods, or which cannot be distinguished in its essential aspects from such a trademark, and which thereby infringes the trademark-holder's rights under Community law, as provided for by Council Regulation (EC) No 40/94 of 20 December 1993 on the Community trademark (⁴) or the law of the Member State in which the application for action by the customs authorities is made;
annotations.translation: (1) 根据欧盟理事会 1993 年 12 月 20 日关于欧盟商标的 (EC) 第 40/94 号条例 (⁴) 或向海关当局提出诉讼申请的成员国的法律，未经授权，在商品上，包括包装，标注与同类型商品有效注册的商标相同的商标，或该商标基本无法区分的商标，从而侵犯了共同体法律规定的商标持有者的权利；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) any trademark symbol (including a logo, label, sticker, brochure, instructions for use or guarantee document bearing such a symbol), even if presented separately, on the same conditions as the goods referred to in point (i);
annotations.translation: (2) 任何商标标志（包括徽标、标签、贴纸、小册子、带有该标志的说明或保证文件），即使是单独呈现的，其条件与第 (1) 点所述货物相同；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) packaging materials bearing the trademarks of counterfeit goods, presented separately, on the same conditions as the goods referred to in point (i);
annotations.translation: (3) 单独呈现的印有假冒商品商标的包装材料，其条件与第 (1) 点所述货物相同；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) 'pirated goods', namely goods which are or contain copies made without the consent of the holder of a copyright or related right or design right, regardless of whether it is registered in national law, or of a person authorised by the right-holder in the country of production in cases where the making of those copies would constitute an infringement of that right under Council Regulation (EC) No 6/2002 of 12 December 2001 on Community designs (⁵) or the law of the Member State in which the application for customs action is made;
annotations.translation: (b)“盗版商品”，即未经版权或相关权利或设计权持有者或生产国权利持有者授权的人同意而制作的或含有复制品的商品，而不论该商品是否已在国内法中登记， 根据 2001 年 12 月 12 日关于共同体外观设计 (⁵) 的理事会 (EC) 第 6/2002 号条例或申请海关采取行动的成员国法律，制作这些复制品将构成对该权利的侵犯；

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.translation: (⁵) OJ L 3，2002 年 1 月 5 日，第 1 页。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (⁴) OJ L 11, 14.01.1994, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 807/2003.
annotations.translation: (⁴) OJ L 11，1994 年 1 月 14 日，第 1 页。经 (EC) 第 807/2003 号条例最后修正的条例。
